703738f-a.text:
Columbia Street, west side, north of Verona Street. At the left is seen the American Can Co. on Dwight Street, between
Delevan and Verona Streets.
June 9, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
703738f-a.folder: Columbia Street & Verona Street, Brooklyn, NY

705056f-b.text:
Huntington Street, north side, east from Columbia Street. The low building in the center background, seen across the lot, is
Public School No. 27..
June 9, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a later date. a new addition to the school
is under construetion.
April 9, 1939
P.L.Sperr
705056f-b.folder: Huntington Street & Columbia Street, Brooklyn, NY
